_sText:
Here is a fully playable 1 player mini-game version of the Plants vs. Zombies indie game. The concept of the map is simple; gather sun, plant plants and stop the zombies from eating your brain!

Features of the map;

- 7 Levels of zombies, were each level spawns dozens of zombies

- 6 Types of zombies, including zombies armed with car doors

- 6 Different custom plant models

- 2 Versions of the garden

- Easy and Hard difficulty

- Awesome PvZ music

- Information buttons everywhere for the beginners

Majority of the credits goes to Charli, since he is the major creator of the advanced triggers, functions and outputs that made this map functional.

Please enjoy,
Charli and Lickwim.

Note: If you are familiar with the PvZ concept, you should start playing at the hard difficulty. Also, if you find your radar missing after playing this map, simply type cl_radaralpha 255 in the console. :)
